issue.title: [R] Check for valid inputs in more places
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7984](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7984). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In trying to reproduce bug reports, I typically hit code paths I don't usually use, and I often give some input that I expect should work and instead cause a segfault. That's no good.
